law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 177, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 84, effective July 13, 1984; and ch. 216, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 214, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(9); and ch. 285, sec. 1. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 1.
